title: Tassel, 1000–1200
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: twisted fringe, embroidered cord
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Agnes M. O'Donnell
description: Large tassel with long heavy twisted red wool fringes and wool yarn stretched in 1/4" band of white, red, green, yellow over the top of the core, and a thick stiff stem of cotton yarns wound tightly with cotton threads over which stem stitch appears to have been worked in a design of geometrical rosettes, with a diamond center, in black, red, white, yellow wool ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel, 1000–1200.Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: twisted fringe, embroidered cord. Museum purchase through gift of Agnes M. O'Donnell. 1951-132-5.
